Rulings.Base:
1. This is a Trigger Effect that activates after damage calculation.
2. When the effect of "Wattgiraffe" is being applied, your opponent cannot do any of the following:

[*]Activate a Spell or Trap Card.
[*]Activate the effect of a Spell or Trap Card that is already face-up on the field.
[*]Activate the effect of a Spell or Trap Card that's in the GY, like "Skill Successor".
[*]Activate any monster effect that starts a Chain.
